long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Play Time shooter 3 Games right now. Discover the Joy of palying this game - Your Ultimate Online Happy Experience! Try it now!

Introduction
Welcome to the world of Time Shooter 3, where time travel and intense shooting action collide! In this thrilling first-person shooter game, you'll harness the power of time manipulation to navigate through challenging levels and take down enemies. Get ready for an adrenaline-fueled adventure as you battle through different eras and rewrite history!

How To Play?
Playing Time Shooter 3 requires a combination of shooting skills and strategic time manipulation. Use the WASD keys to move your character and the mouse to aim and shoot. However, the key to success lies in mastering the time travel mechanics.

Press the designated time travel key to slow down time, allowing you to dodge bullets, plan your moves, and gain the upper hand. Use this ability strategically to overcome obstacles, outmaneuver enemies, and solve time-based puzzles. Be mindful of your time energy meter, as it depletes with each use and requires time orbs scattered throughout the levels to recharge.


Extension Button Menu
*Play more games and explore cool themes on the page menu buttons.
